ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Facilitates secret management by storing credentials in a dedicated file, keeping them out of your code base. The secrets are stored without encryption. This package is compatible with secrets stored by the 'SecretsProvider' 'Python' package <https://pypi.org/project/SecretsProvider/>.

Facilitates secret management by storing credentials in a dedicated file, keeping them out of your code base. The secrets are stored without encryption. This package is compatible with secrets stored by the 'SecretsProvider' 'Python' package <https://pypi.org/project/SecretsProvider/>.

name: r-secretsprovider
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-secretsprovider
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/SecretsProvider_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/SecretsProvider/SecretsProvider_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f978dcacd20df73cba1713acd3d6b3498ffe97813f436795a74b8fa688fabb19

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-getpass
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-getpass

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('SecretsProvider')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('SecretsProvider')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=SecretsProvider
  license: Apache-2.0
  summary: Facilitates secret management by storing credentials in a dedicated file, keeping them out of your code base. The secrets are stored without encryption. This package is compatible with secrets stored by the 'SecretsProvider' 'Python' package <https://pypi.org/project/SecretsProvider/>.
  license_family: APACHE
  license_file: LICENSE.txt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - KoenGreuell
